name: Come here you little jerks!
description:
You've been hired by a rich cow of a woman to walk her spoiled dogs. These pups don't really care for you or your goals. That's why there's a button to get grumpy.

-Story and comedy driven

-Time to complete > 5 minutes

This is a game I made for the 31st GM48 jam. I went for a walk to think of ideas, and remembered what it's like to walk a dog that has no interest in getting anywhere. This game was made in 2 days.
